title: [Summit Academy, North Ellipse]
description: Snow-dusted firs grow along the curved stone paths that encircle the commons.  Smoke swirls from the chimney atop a two-story grey stone building, while its windows glow warmly as firelight shines from behind their frosted panes.

Snow-dusted firs grow along the curved stone paths that encircle the commons.  Smoke swirls from the chimney atop a two-story grey stone building, while its windows shine brightly as sunlight relfects off their frosted panes.
